= Introduction =

This page describe how to build ab from apachebenche-standalone. 


= Download source code =

You can get the source code from the svn repository. Please follow the instruction on Source page to check it out. 

For end users, the best way is to download a release [http://code.google.com/p/apachebench-standalone/source source] package from our download page.
